content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani

content: Good afternoon Mister Heine. Thank you for considering my application for the apartment. I am looking for the best possible rental price that fits my budget. May I know what you are offering?
name: Juan Mamani

content: Your offer is 800 Euros per month, but I am willing to negotiate. What is your counteroffer?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you for offering 800 Euros per month. I am interested in the apartment, but I am hoping for a lower rental price. May I know if there is any room for negotiation?
name: Juan Mamani

content:
Of course, I am willing to discuss a lower rental price. What do you have in mind?

Please keep in mind that I am a landlord and my goal is to maximize my gains.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I understand your goal as a landlord, but I am looking for the best possible rental price that fits my budget. May I know if there is any flexibility in the rental price?
name: Juan Mamani
